author: arkurth
msg: Updated install_perl_libs.pl. Fixed problem where Perl modules failed to install if "notest" function is not available from the CPAN module. This function is only available on newer versions.
Added -l and -p arguments to allow only Linux packages or Perl modules to be installed -- useful for testing the script.
Added LWP::Protocol::https to list of Perl modules to install.

author: markt
msg: Use the interface rather than the default implementation
